PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meta Anual
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_META_VENDA_V1.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue>YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) AND B.FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S') ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL))) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL)))) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)))</CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue> <CriteriaWhereClause>YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) AND B.FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S') ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL))) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL)))) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)))</CriteriaWhereClause> <Status>PLANEJADO_MONEY</Status> <TotalValue>PLANEJADO</TotalValue> <ValueFormat>C</ValueFormat> <Value>REALIZADO</Value> <Description>Meta Anual</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>green</Color> <ValueAggregation>2</ValueAggregation> <TileType>2</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meta Trimestral
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_META_VENDA_V1_TRI.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue>YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) AND B.FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S') ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) ) AND DATEPART(QUARTER,A.DATA) = DATEPART(QUARTER,CONCAT(YEAR(GETDATE()),'/',CASE WHEN @CAMPO(MES) = '' THEN CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN 'Janeiro' WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN 'Abril' WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 7 AND 9 THEN 'Julho' WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 10 AND 12 THEN 'Outubro' END ELSE @CAMPO(MES) END,'/','1')) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL))) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL)))) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)))</CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue> <CriteriaWhereClause>YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) AND B.FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S') ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.USUARIO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) ) AND DATEPART(QUARTER,A.DATA) = DATEPART(QUARTER,CONCAT(YEAR(GETDATE()),'/',CASE WHEN @CAMPO(MES) = '' THEN CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN 'Janeiro' WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN 'Abril' WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 7 AND 9 THEN 'Julho' WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) BETWEEN 10 AND 12 THEN 'Outubro' END ELSE @CAMPO(MES) END,'/','1')) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL))) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL)))) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND D.VERTICAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)))</CriteriaWhereClause> <Status>PLANEJADO_MONEY</Status> <TotalValue>PLANEJADO</TotalValue> <ValueFormat>C</ValueFormat> <Value>REALIZADO</Value> <Description>Meta Trimestral</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>green</Color> <ValueAggregation>2</ValueAggregation> <TileType>2</TileType> </TileAttributes>

MONTH(GETDATE()) ELSE @CAMPO(MES) END AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND B.FILIAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) AND B.FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S') ) AND MONTH(A.DATA) = CASE WHEN @CAMPO(MES) = '' THEN MONTH(GETDATE()) ELSE @CAMPO(MES) END AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END PageWidgetPortable.Title: Temperatura / Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_GRAPH_V1_TEMPERATURA.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.DATAFECHAMENTO IS NOT NULL AND B.GANHA = 'N' AND B.PERDE = 'N' AND B.CANCELA= 'N' AND B.SUSPENDE= 'N' AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.FILIAL IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.FILIAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) AND A.FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S')) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.RESPONSAVEL IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.RESPONSAVEL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL))) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL)))) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS))) </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>400</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: FASE / VALOR
PageWidgetPortable.Subtitle: Privado
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_V1_FUNIL_FASE_VALOR.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_PRIVADA</CommandName> <CriteriaWhereClause>B.PUBLICOPRIVADO = 2 AND B.PERDE = 'N' AND B.GANHA = 'N' AND B.CANCELA= 'N' AND B.SUSPENDE= 'N' AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.FILIAL IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM FILIAIS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(FILIAL) ) AND K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S' ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.FILIAL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(FILIAL)) AND A.FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS WHERE K_EHREVENDA='S' AND K_FILIALATIVA='S')) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.RESPONSAVEL IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.RESPONSAVEL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL))) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL)))) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO NOT IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS))) </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>400</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

(@CAMPO(USUARIOS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND A.RESPONSAVEL NOT IN ( @CAMPO(USUARIOS)) ) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL))) OR (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) = 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE VERTICAL IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAL)))) AND ( (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(HANDLE) > 0 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END FROM K_CRM_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE IN (@CAMPO(VERTICAIS) ) ) = CAST(1 AS BIT) AND C.PRODUTO IN ( @CAMPO(VERTICAIS)) OR
